name: The Summer Solstice Scuffle
description:
Seven teams of three. Six all-expenses-paid vacation tickets on the line. Who will come out on top?

This was a small game jam game, inspired by Fire Emblem Fates's Beach Brawl DLC, made for Muyoko-Honey's First Birthday Game Jam. A small strategy RPG with seven possible endings- one for each playable team.
